=======
CHANGES
=======

0.6.0 (2011-01-24)
------------------

- Requiring ``zam.api`` 0.7 or newer for ZTK 1.0 compatibility.

- Updated tests to run with ``z3c.form`` 2.1 or newer thus requiring at
  least this version.

- Updated author email and home page address in package meta data.


0.5.0 (2008-04-16)
------------------

- Initial Release
